title: Aníbal Fernández | AS/COA
snippet: En el 2003, durante el gobierno del Presidente Kirchner fue nombrado ministro del interior y en el 2007, durante el gobierno de Cristina Fernández, fue designado ministro de justicia, seguridad y derechos humanos.

title: ANÍBAL FERNÁNDEZ ASUME LA PRESIDENCIA DE LA CAH | Novedades | Confederación Argentina de Hockey
snippet: Aníbal Fernández resultó electo presidente de la Confederación Argentina de Hockey luego de la realización de la Asamblea Anual Ordinaria de la institución y ocupará el máximo cargo hasta el año 2025.

title: Aníbal Fernández - Wikipedia
snippet: Aníbal Domingo Fernández (born January 9, 1957) is an Argentine Justicialist Party politician, lawyer, and certified public accountant. Throughout his career, he has remained a close ally to the former Presidents Néstor Kirchner and Cristina Fernández de Kirchner.

title: The disgraceful Aníbal Fernández was reelected as president of the CAH
snippet: During the Annual Ordinary Assembly, Aníbal Fernández was reelected this Saturday as president of the Argentine Confederation of Field and Indoor Hockey (CAH) for the period 2025-2029.

title: Aníbal Fernández facts for kids
snippet: He has held many important government jobs under three different presidents. He worked in these roles for more than nine years in total. He was the Minister of Production, Interior Minister, and Minister of Justice.
